Review Name: Moderate Review Description: Below average. cons 1) swing works only half way 2) swing button in remote not working properly 3) flows air only in the center of room.. you won't feel blown air on the side corners 4) when I did a first service of the AC I came to know one of the filter in indoor unit is missing (Flipkart did not took any responsibility as AC was 2 month old and voltas Informed me to contact Flipkart) 5) not at all power saving. 6) indoor makes lil bit of creaking noise some times. pros 1) cooling is normal and fast
